name: Chrysalis (itch)
description:
Traverse through the void in the adventure platforming game Chrysalis made for GameDevNetowrk's Fig Jam.

The game is currently in development and is due to have a demo release by March 4th. Until then view the devlog / twitter account to see the games development,

Twitter - https://twitter.com/_KingZer0_

Or check out the other submissions to GDN's Fig Jam - https://itch.io/jam/game-dev-network-fig-jam
